ui.models.appLayout.Sidebar.longDescription: Has similar properties to an HTML `aside` element.

params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.
params.name: children

params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.
params.name: style

params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.
params.name: attributes

params.description: Events to listen to on component. Default: `{}`.
params.name: events

ui.models.appLayout.Dialog.longDescription:
Has similar properties to an HTML `div` element with attribute `Dialog`.
Should have children `ui.models.appLayout.DialogTitle` and `ui.models.appLayout.DialogContent`.

params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.
params.name: children

params.description: Styling to use on component. Default: `{}`.

params.description: HTML attributes to use on component. Default: `{}`.

appLayoutFunctions.dialogs.register.shortDescription: Register any menu for events and accessibility which is an instance of `ui.models.appLayout.Menu`.

params.description: DOM object of menu to register. Default: `dom.element("div[menu]")`.
params.name: domObject

appLayoutFunctions.dialogs.close.shortDescription: Close any menu which is an instance of `ui.models.appLayout.Menu`.

params.description: DOM object of menu to close. Default: `dom.element("div[menu]")`.
params.name: domObject

appLayoutFunctions.scrollContent.shortDescription: Scroll the main UI content to the specified vector.

params.description: Vector class to scroll content to. Default: `new ui.Vector(0, 0)`.
params.name: scrollTo
